Package items

Class Item

java.lang.Object
main.Entity
items.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Previewable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttackBoost, HealthBoost, RandomStatBoost, RandomTrigger, SelectTrigger, SpeedBoost
public abstract class Item extends Entity
Generic Item. Used to define common traits between all the specific items.
Version:
1.2, Apr 2022
Author:
Jackie Jone
